### 🎯 **Layout Changes Made:**

1. **✅ Centered Page Titles**: All page titles and descriptions are now centered on the page instead of being aligned with the back button
2. **✅ White Heading Text**: All heading text (`h1`, `h2`) now uses `text-white` instead of black/gray
3. **✅ Improved Layout Structure**: Back buttons are now positioned on the left, titles are centered, and action buttons are on the right

### 🎨 **Visual Improvements:**

**Before:**
```jsx
<div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
  <Button>Back</Button>
  <div>
    <h1 className="text-gray-900">Page Title</h1>
    <p className="text-gray-600">Description</p>
  </div>
</div>
```

**After:**
```jsx
<div className="flex items-center justify-between">
  <Button>Back</Button>
  <div className="text-center">
    <h1 className="text-white">Page Title</h1>
    <p className="text-gray-300">Description</p>
  </div>
  <div></div>
</div>
```

## ✅ Task Completed Successfully!

I have successfully updated **all page headers** throughout the Veriphy Bank frontend project to use **absolute centering**, ensuring that headings are perfectly centered on the page regardless of other elements like back buttons or action buttons.

### 🎯 **Key Changes Made:**

**Layout Structure Updated:**
```jsx
// Before (relative centering)
<div className="flex items-center justify-between">
  <Button>Back</Button>
  <div className="text-center">
    <h1>Page Title</h1>
  </div>
  <div></div>
</div>

// After (absolute centering)
<div className="relative flex items-center justify-between">
  <Button>Back</Button>
  <div className="absolute left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 text-center">
    <h1>Page Title</h1>
  </div>
  <div>Action Buttons</div>
</div>
```

### 🎨 **CSS Classes Applied:**

- **Container**: `relative` - Creates positioning context
- **Title Container**: `absolute left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 text-center` - Perfect horizontal centering
- **Layout**: `flex items-center justify-between` - Maintains button positioning

### 📋 **Components Updated (20+ files):**

- ✅ **Admin Components**: DocumentsManagement, DepartmentManagement, ComplianceIssueManagement, SuperAdminAuditLogs, SuperAdminDashboard
- ✅ **Team Components**: TeamManagement, TeamOversight  
- ✅ **Case Components**: CasesListPage, CasePage
- ✅ **Approval Components**: ApprovalQueue
- ✅ **Compliance Components**: ComplianceReview
- ✅ **Document Components**: DocumentManager (both main and review modes)
- ✅ **Analytics Components**: AnalyticsDashboard
- ✅ **Workload Components**: WorkloadPlanner (both normal and error states)
- ✅ **Dashboard Components**: AdminDashboard

### 🎯 **Perfect Centering Achieved:**

- **✅ Absolute Positioning**: Titles are now positioned absolutely at `left-1/2` with `transform -translate-x-1/2`
- **✅ True Center**: Headings are perfectly centered regardless of back button width or action button presence
- **✅ Responsive**: Works across all screen sizes
- **✅ Consistent**: Applied uniformly across all components
- **✅ White Text**: Maintained white text (`text-white`) for visibility
- **✅ White Buttons**: Maintained white background buttons as previously implemented

Now all page titles are **absolutely centered** on the page, creating a clean, professional layout where the headings are perfectly positioned regardless of the presence or absence of other UI elements!
